title: Arma 3 APEX + 7 DLC RePack by xatab
description:
Year: 2013
Genre: Action, 3D, 1st Person, 3rd Person
Developer: Bohemia Interactive
Publisher: Bohemia Interactive
Publisher in Russia: Buka
Publishing Type: Repack
Language: RUS | ENG | MULTI
Voice set Language: ENG
Tablet: enclosing (LumaEmu)

- A new game engine allows you to control combat operations with unprecedented realism.
- Now you can dive under the water!
- Variety of weapons - from the "classic" AK-74 and M-16 and not yet released into production prototypes.
- By combining all the positive qualities of predecessors with a new engine and evolutionary capabilities, the ARMA 3 provides the player with nothing comparable experience in tactical combat.
- Create your own game scenarios using a simple and intuitive mission editor.

Repack features : 

Nothing is converted / not cut
- Version - 1.62.0.137126 complete list of changes on the official site: https://dev.arma3.com/post/spotrep-00052

Includes DLC:

Arma 3 Helicopters
Arma 3 Karts
Arma 3 Zeus
Arma 3 Marksmen
Arma 3 Nexus
Added Arma 3 APEX 
Arma 3 -DLC Bundle

-Installation of 20 minutes.

Repack by xatab

Choose your language settings in the menu of the game.

How to install :

Mount or burn
Install
Play
